name: ALERT_CRITERIA_DB_KEY
description: This table contains debug details on the criteria that triggered the alert.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the detailed criteria in the alert. Together with ALERT_ID and CONTACT_DATE_REAL, this forms the foreign key to the ALERT_CRITERIA table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple debug keys associated with the alert criteria from the ALERT_CRITERIA table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.
